mapper.insert: insert into injection(ijno, vaccine, rabies, covid, influenza, kennelcough, leukemia, heartworm, authelmintic, aid, eid, injection_date) values (#{ijno}, #{vaccine}, #{rabies}, #{covid}, #{influenza}, #{kennelcough}, #{leukemia}, #{heartworm}, #{authelmintic}, #{aid}, #{eid}, #{injection_date})
mapper.select: select injection_seq.nextval as ijno from dual
